palmos
Class NetLib.NetSocketOptEnum

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--palmos.NetLib.NetSocketOptEnum
Enclosing class:
NetLib
public static class NetLib.NetSocketOptEnum
extends java.lang.Object

Option constants that can be passed to NetSocketOptionSet and NetSocketOptionGet When an option is set or retrieved, both the level of the option and the option number must be specified. The level refers to which layer the option refers to, like the uppermost socket layer, for example.

netSocketOptSockMultiPktAddr

public static final short netSocketOptSockMultiPktAddr
for SOCK_RDM (RMP) sockets. This is the fixed IP addr (i.e. Mobitex MAN #) to use for multiple packet requests
